name: Deep Dish Pizza
ingredients: 1/4 cup parmesan cheese, 1 ounce (I used the kind in a can)
8 ounces Italian cheese blend or mozzarella cheese, shredded
Assorted toppings: pepperoni, ham, sausage, 4 ounce can mushrooms, green peppers, bacon, ground beef, etc.
Dash of garlic pepper or garlic powder and some Italian seasoning for top of pizza
utensils: 9x13" glass baking dish or rimmed baking sheet

instructions.en: Mix cream cheese, eggs, parmesan, seasonings, and 8 oz mozzarella in a bowl until well-blended.
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte krémový syr, vajcia, parmezán, korenie a 230 g mozzarelly v miske, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: ボウルにクリームチーズ、卵、パルメザン、調味料、モッツァレラ230gを入れ、よく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Spread cheese mixture evenly in greased 9x13" dish or lined baking sheet.
instructions.sk: Rozotrite syrovou zmes rovnomerne do vymastenej 23x33 cm formy alebo vyloženého plechu.
instructions.ja: 油を塗った23x33cmの型または裏打ちしたベーキングシートにチーズの混合物を均等に広げます。

instructions.en: Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-25 minutes until evenly browned. Cool completely on wire rack.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 190°C 20-25 minút, kým nezhnedne rovnomerne. Nechajte úplne vychladnúť na drôtenej mriežke.
instructions.ja: 375°F（190°C）で20-25分、均一に焼き色がつくまで焼きます。ワイヤーラックの上で完全に冷まします。

instructions.en: Spread crust with pizza sauce, cheese, and chosen toppings. Sprinkle with seasonings.
instructions.sk: Natrite cesto pizzovou omáčkou, syrom a vybranými prísadami. Posypte korením.
instructions.ja: クラストにピザソース、チーズ、選んだトッピングを乗せます。調味料をふりかけます。

instructions.en: Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until toppings are bubbly. Let stand before cutting.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 190°C 15-20 minút, kým prísady nie sú bublinkové. Pred krájaním nechajte odstáť.
instructions.ja: 375°F（190°C）で15-20分、トッピングが泡立つまで焼きます。切る前に少し置きます。

notes: Makes 8 servings. Can be frozen. Chilling the crust before topping is optional.
